name: Validate Spec Requirements
description: Validates that requirements.md files include all 4 standard requirements from orb-templates spec standards

then.prompt:
A spec requirements.md file was edited. Validate it includes ALL 4 standard requirements from orb-templates spec standards:

1. Documentation Updates requirement
2. Version and Changelog Management requirement
3. Git Commit Standards requirement
4. Final Verification requirement

If any are missing, add them immediately. Use search_standards_tool('spec standards') to get the exact format if needed.
